name: Ext_R3_MedicationDispense_status
title: Cross-version Extension for R3.MedicationDispense.status for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version extension represents MedicationDispense.status from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicationDispense|3.0.2 for use in FHIR R4.

element.short: preparation | in-progress | on-hold | completed | entered-in-error | stopped
element.definition: A code specifying the state of the set of dispense events.
element.comment: `MedicationDispense.status` maps to R4 `MedicationDispense.status`. The value set relationship of SourceIsBroaderThanTarget is INCOMPATIBLE for a required binding on a `code` type in this direction. So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
element.isModifierReason: This extension is a modifier because the target element MedicationDispense.status is flagged IsModifier

element.short: preparation | in-progress | on-hold | completed | entered-in-error | stopped
element.definition: A code specifying the state of the set of dispense events.
element.comment: `MedicationDispense.status` maps to R4 `MedicationDispense.status`. The value set relationship of SourceIsBroaderThanTarget is INCOMPATIBLE for a required binding on a `code` type in this direction. So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

binding.description: A coded concept specifying the state of the dispense event.
